entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 6.5°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: 5.3°C

entry.title: Monday: Rain. Temperature steady near 9.
entry.summary: Rain. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 this afternoon. Temperature steady near 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening except northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near mainland valleys and inlets before morning. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
